name: Jennifer Marie
text: Awesome staff! Clean restaurant and great food! The employees were so friendly! My husband had never been here before and they explained all the options and even gave great suggestions!

name: Carrie Fite
text: Love their pizza!  It's been hard finding a pizza comparable to what I grew up on.  I'm from the south, so Awesome pizza places are hard to find around here.  Pie Five definitely has my vote because your pizza is always fresh and there's …More

name: Mj Grube
text: Great counter service... Quality of ingredients looked great, if your pizza sucks it's because you picked wrong ;) One of those fancy coke machines. Rewards club... Able to get what you want on your pizza and not have to wash dishes to pay for it!

name: Stuart Burson
text: Had the cauliflower crust and it was wonderful.  The pizza itself was very good.  My only concern is the employee who put together my order acted like she would rather be anywhere but there.  No smile and would not speak up when asking me what I wanted on my pizza.

name: Mickaila Tippie Stamp
text: I have a gluten allergy and was very impressed with the way they handled everything from the pizza to sauce. However, I was disappointed in the way the dough tasted, you could clearly tell it was gluten free dough and the sauce was watery. …More

name: S. Elizabeth Price
text: I love this place.  Food is delicious, and the staff is very attentive.  I got the cauliflower crust with spinach, mushrooms and pepperoni.  It was so good that I ordered another to go for my spouse and I.  He loved it as well.

name: Ashley Oxley
text: Great atmosphere and wonderful selection of different pizzas! Create your own amazing creation or have them create one of their personals.  Can't go wrong! Even has cauliflower crust, which was amazing,  and a gluten free crust too!

name: David Thompson
text: Been here a few times. I like there pizza. You can get whatever you want on them or everything on them. Like picking all my own toppings for the same price. We always get the Cauliflower crust. …More

name: Ronald Lance Teel Byers
text: This is the new pizza place in town, and it really has gone over well with my family. It's a little pricey for what it is, but not enough for me to balk. The service is OK, but not why I come. I would recommend the cauliflower crust! It's …More

name: Colton Moore
text: Food is good and service is good. I love the BBQ chicken pizza. Should definitely give it a try.

name: Mrs. Dan
text: Super fast, delicious, unlimited toppings on perfect crust options. Great idea to serve personalized pizza. We've been here several times and always have a good experience. Staff is generous and pleasant. Pizza is perfectly done. Flavored tea available. Comfortable and clean seating. Will be a regular.

name: Niki Rea
text: First time I have visited this place.  It was great.  The pizza was not greasy.   The veggies were fresh.  The staff was super friendly.  They helped me to decide what crust and sauce to get.  Since you design your own pizza if you don't …More

name: Heather E
text: The staff is friendly and helpful! They were so kind and patient helping me make the perfect pizza for my 4 year old with a dairy allergy. The pizzas we're good and we will be back for more!

name: Aaron Diggens
text: Complete waste of time. It was great when it first opened. Now the place is poorly kept up and the service is marginal at best.

name: Cari Roy
text: Great gluten free pizzas. They only put the toppings you want. Tasted great because its made the way you like it. You choose the crust the sause and and toppings.

name: Joshua Pasket
text: The best customer service experience since I been in lufkin, truly the best people create the best business. My first experience with pie five, as I was carrying my daughter looking at the menu, then a talented customer service intellectual …More

name: God's Gen
text:
Decent price, good food!  We spent $20 got 2 pizzas, cinnamon sticks, and 2  drinks.  Staff was very friendly.  Good family environment!
Service was very fast.

name: Shannon Choate
text: Nice friendly staff love the Cauliflower pizza crust. Yummy

name: John Derrick
text: Good pizza made your way cause you pick the toppings.  Thick or thin crust...alfredo or tomato sauce...you'll love it too....

name: Ramona Harris
text: Staff friendly and competent. Food fresh. Displayed nicely. I would say it was like "subway" sandwiches but the subway franchise is not as clean or as appealing lately.

name: Jack R
text: You might as well buy a frozen pizza and cook it yourself. This pizza has absolutely no taste and is comparable to a pizza hut express. Little to no quality. Staff was nice and the dining area and restrooms were clean.

name: T B
text: Pretty good food. It's like Subway for pizza. Make sure you get the pesto sauce!

name: Clayton Cummings
text: Pretty good. If you like toppings, you'll have to tell them to add more. They are conservative on pepperoni. Taste good though.

name: Aubrey Koutz
text: The food was okay. The sauce was really sweet and my daughter didn't like it. Only one employee was friendly and looked happy to be there. My sister loved it.

name: Robert Ramirez
text: We have been coming here since it opened and every visit is great.  Great food, great people, great atmosphere.  I would recommend this place to anyone.

name: Jacob Pouland
text: Create your own pizza and eat it, too! Pie Five is a place with tasty food and amazing service. Vegan/vegetarian options are available, as well, and is it DELICIOUS! While you're there, try some cinnamon sticks or a slice of brownie for desert!

name: girl child
text: Great atmosphere, family friendly, great food awesome service.

text: Absolutely will be going back. Taste better than any pizza place I've ever eaten st.

text: Great pizza! Works like Subway. You pick the crust and toppings. They cook it. Good variety of ingredients and fast cooking. We had 5 pizzas ready by the time I was done paying.

name: Jr Roberts

text: Friend gave my wife  B-day gift card cause it is a favorite light meal pizza for two light eaters.. tasty and ready in under 5 minutes.

name: Heather Sears

name: racheal bernal
text: Disappointed in the amount of pizza you get for the price. Need to put more meat on. Could get bigger pizza for same price elsewhere. Serve customers in order and with a smiling face.

name: Aleta Tullous
text: I had to ask for a receipt. As suspected I was overcharged for my meal. I spoke to the manager on duty who didn't really seem to want to listen. He gave me a couple of dollars back but I was overcharged more than that. I left with a feeling of not being appreciated so my business will go elsewhere.

name: geoffrey gordon
text: Really like the new cauliflower pizza crust. It needs to be cooked a bit longer for the toppings to be done or not stick so many pizzas in the oven at one time.
